channel.title: How to change IP in this delta source?
channel.description:
Hello! My question: how can i change server IP in this delta source: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,494307.0.html
Thanks!

item.title: How to change IP in this delta source?
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

harusakura1:

No, i want to change the server’s IP. Like where players need to join.

I’m not too sure I know what you’re talking about, because Andrew was right you have to go in Gui.java and change the IP there.

EDIT
I see you have a EGUI.java not a GUI.java… So I’m going to put some pictures on what I think you’re supposed to do for other players to get on, again I’m not entirely familiar with Delta sources:

helping3.png1023×575

helping4.png1023×575

When you’re all done coding and everything, that’s when you change all the IP’s and make a download for it. But you need to connect to your Local Host(Which is 127.0.0.1) so once it’s uploaded, go back and change all the IP’s back to what they were.(In Client.java leave the server = blank if that works, and you know what to do with EGUI.java)

Read full topic
item.source: How to change IP in this delta source?

item.title: How to change IP in this delta source?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

I’m guessing that server is running on a bluurrs client. In that case, you must go in the client files and go into Gui.java and search for the current Ip address. On another note, please post questions like this in the “Client Help” section, but I’m guessing you didn’t know it was in there so this will slide.

Read full topic
